title: Strengthening Practical Business Strategy Competencies: Enhancing Self-Efficacy in Mathematics Majors Through Network-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Knowledge and Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their self-efficacy in mathematical problem-solving processes by over 20% using a personal learning network.
Learners can perform peer feedback activities at least twice weekly through a blog-based learning community.
Learners can complete at least one industry-linked project per semester based on networking experiences with mathematics experts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
